titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the work opportunity credit to include the hiring of certain domestic abuse victims by small employers, and for other purposes.
Employment Assistance for Victims of Domestic Abuse Act of 2007
Employment Assistance for Victims of Domestic Abuse Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Employment Assistance for Victims of Domestic Abuse Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow small employers (employers averaging 50 or fewer employees) a work opportunity tax credit for hiring an individual receiving assistance as a victim of domestic abuse.
